title: FS: Lot Of 4 T205's SGC Graded Cicotte Bender Turner Collins SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: Lot Of 4 T205's SGC Graded Cicotte Bender Turner Collins SOLD
posts.post_content:
Nice group of 4 cards that I just bought from Eliot that I now need to move for another card, of course. I am only selling as a lot and am not splitting them up. I paid 390.00 for them but I will take SOLD PayPal friends/family please. Thanks for looking.

Joe K
